description: A minimalist-style restaurant featuring a wood decor, an extensive display of bottles, and some windows boasting partial yet splendid views of the Dolomites. The chef here prepares creative cuisine using local ingredients alongside produce sourced from other regions. The wine list includes a wide selection of natural wines.
